body: What's the best defense you've ever had? For me it was either a giant office building on Rendesvouz or when I made a giant mansion on Proleium
body_tagged: What's the best defense you've ever had? For me it was either a giant office building on Rendesvouz or when I made a giant mansion on Proleium
title: Favorite defense you've ever been a part of?

replies.body: Mine was with a couple of friends (orccaptain and awesomeninjaminer) when we built an impenetrable defence made out of iron and wood on senex I, it was a great game that ended with our team winning!
replies.body_tagged: Mine was with a couple of friends (orccaptain and awesomeninjaminer) when we built an impenetrable defence made out of iron and wood on senex I, it was a great game that ended with our team winning!

replies.body: I love when I 'renovate' a monument with my friend Alicia_Nirui123. We usually do it on Senex II, there was this one time where we did this amazing defence and no one from the other team could get in it!
replies.body_tagged: I love when I 'renovate' a monument with my friend Alicia_Nirui123. We usually do it on Senex II, there was this one time where we did this amazing defence and no one from the other team could get in it!

replies.body:
Mine was with my brother, cousin, two of my irl friends, and various people on a Ternio. We made the back monument like some huge wooden pirate ship/ vault/ fortress and just protected it insanely. It looked epic.

My other one was on a Justice, with my brother and others I can't remember, and we made this epic little box with train tracks in a circle around the monument and minecarts. xD Great times.

replies.body: I remember mining the area under both monuments in Senex 1. Then people from the other team would jump down trying to land on the monument. I am going to guess that 90% of the time they missed the monument and hit the ground and die. but if they hit the monument they had an army of 17 full iron lads waiting for them!! LOL!
replies.body_tagged: I remember mining the area under both monuments in Senex 1. Then people from the other team would jump down trying to land on the monument. I am going to guess that 90% of the time they missed the monument and hit the ground and die. but if they hit the monument they had an army of 17 full iron lads waiting for them!! LOL!

replies.body:
I usually break all the castle in forstbite with full dia and 4 more team8s make slab platform ladders and slabs on the 4 monuments buttons around preasure plates on the floor
step 2: challange urself. /leave then join the other team and try breaking it then feel like ur god say gg till your soul tells you to stop then repeat on the next map only if its a frostbite rotation :D
